name: Dimension Data Public Cloud
oneline: Overall Experience is excellent because of the Service Delivery and Smooth Project Management by Dimensions Data. Truly recommend them.A Data Dimension is a set of data attributes pertaining to something of interest to a business.  Dimensions are things like customers, products, stores and time. Intuitive interface, multiple points of presence worldwide.  Great csat and choice of public and private cloud. Account team and support has been incredibly reponsive and easy to work with. Environment is stable, reliable, available. Technical support is outstanding. Customer support is good. Able to take advantage of capacity on demand for additional cost savings. Some (hidden) gotchas - notably on availability of certain services on various service tiers. Administrative support has been weak. I am neutral.People with knowledge, however constant org change was/is the biggest issue and inability in responding to request when urgent.
